channel.title: Catgrill Night Jesterless - [2/7] - Jester won. Even two of them
channel.description:
![image|500x385](upload://lLisGpWKPhruvWoN37hqQezRas9.jpeg)
# Welcome to Catgrill Night Jesterless!
Hosted by eevee Game Manager: Geydenyan
# Rules
1. Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules - Please Read First ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), and the [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926).
# Game **Mafia chat** - Works through day and night **Mafia kill** - Compulsory **Phases** - 48 hours / 5 minutes In case of quickhammers, extensions are allowed. **Actions** - Can (and probably should be) presubmited. **Yeets** - True majority based [details="True Majority"] True Majority - Elimination will happen upon reaching majority. If no full majority is reached in a given time frame, all people who did not vote will not count towards majority requierment and votes will be checked again. Example - If there is 15 people in game, but only 9 have voted, majority would be 5 instead. [/details]
# Setup
[color]**Catgrill - Lynchproof Innocent Child** **2 Cat Guards - Immune to scratching. While you are alive, the Catgrill is immune to cooking.** **2 Grill Guards - Immune to cooking. While you are alive, the Catgrill is immune to scratching.**[/color] [color=red]**2 Jester Goons**[/color]
Jesters may submit two kills every night - one cooking, and one scratching. May target same person.
[color]Catgrills wincon[/color] - Eliminate all members of jester faction. [color=red]Jesters wincon[/color] - Eliminate all members of catgrill faction. *Total destruction imminent.*
# Playerlist 1. Marluxion 2. gorta - [color]Catgrill[/color] 3. ~~KyoDaz~~ - [color]Town Grill[/color] - Died N2 4. ~~clonedcheese~~ - [color]Town Grill[/color] - Elimed D1 5. ~~Light~~ - [color]Town Cat[/color] - Died N2 6. ~~Intensify~~ - [color]Town Cat[/color] - Elimed D2 7. Ami
# Backup 1. Nightingale 2. Osie 3. Crichard
# Spectator 1. astand 2. Pigeon 3. Jane 4. Eli 5. Appel 6. Amelia 7. Dat 8. Chloe 9. Min 10. Napoleon 11. Windward

item.description:
No, you weren’t, but most of you guys weren’t. However, you did well, and it’s a step in the right direction.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
You panic claiming and then not self-pressing at L-2 LYLO does not make sense
It doesn’t line up at all
I had no idea what you did this game but I don’t care because we were all terrible

Read full topic

item.title: Catgrill Night Jesterless - [2/7] - Jester won. Even two of them
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
clonedcheese:

imagine having this as your reasoning for MLing a townie when you could have read the arguments and killed an actual wolf

I did read the arguments. They weren’t particularly good; but you were a better vote than Ami for me.
I told you that you had the opportunity to start another wagon because I wasn’t voting Ami and you tried to vote Marl
Your argument towards Marl wasn’t very convincing either
I felt like nobody actually came up with any valid reasons to kill people this game

You had plently of opportunity to not get voted out even with the terrible claim because I did acknowledge it wasn’t AI but you managed to get voted by me anyway because you wouldn’t self-pres at L-2 and possible LYLO

Read full topic

item.title: Catgrill Night Jesterless - [2/7] - Jester won. Even two of them
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
clonedcheese:

wonder what part of this tells you I’m scum

None of it. I said this in my argument if you actually read the thread.
It just makes your mislynch if you’re town less harmful than hanging any other villager because you decided to give scum the advantage without having to work for your mislynch.
If you’re going to do blatantly -EV actions then I’m fine with killing you for it on the off chance you are Town, it just sweetens your lynch

Read full topic
